about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm Web Developer with 4 years of experience.
about.description: I like learning about new technologies and I am passionate about my career.

banner.message: Rule #1: If something works, don't touch it.

courses_list.title: Cloud administration
courses_list.description: Course focused on file management of any kind, in the cloud for proper storage.

courses_list.title: Database Administration
courses_list.description: Course focused on the administration of relational databases, in this case MySQL, for the correct creation of tables, stored procedures, triggers, among other functionalities of a relational database.

courses_list.title: Introduction to programming
courses_list.description: This course focused on the basic principles of object-oriented programming, where basic topics were touched on assigning values to the different types of variables, methods, functions, etc...

courses_list.title: Asynchronism in JavaScript 2019
courses_list.description: This course focuses on how asynchronous functions are used, through promises, async/await or functions with Callback.

courses_list.title: Basic JavaScript
courses_list.description: This course is based on the basic concepts of JavaScript, where topics such as what types of variables exist, functions, loops, conditionals, etc...

courses_list.title: Git and Github Professional Course
courses_list.description: This course focused on the main points to make good use of the version manager, in this case Git, where they touched on topics such as committing, uploading changes, downloading changes, making pull requests, reverting and similarly they touched on topics related to repository management, in this case GitHub.

courses_list.title: Prework on Windows
courses_list.description: Course focused on the initial configuration in the Windows Operating System, for an adequate work environment.

services_list.name: Full Stack Developer
services_list.description: I worked 1 year 9 months within the company EGO TI S.A de C.V within the position of Developer, where my tasks were focused on the maintenance of the websites in charge of the company.

services_list.name: Full Stack Developer
services_list.description: I currently work within the company VORTEX DEVELOPMENT in the position of Web Developer, where my main activity is the development of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and other types of company projects.

services_list.name: PHP Developer
services_list.description: I currently work within the company AP INTERFACES in the position of PHP Developer, where my main function is within the Remediation team, where I fix vulnerabilities in various languages, especially PHP.

projects.title: My personal projects.
projects.subtitle: Among some small projects that I have done, they range from exercises to small pages made with Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS, also to practice consuming a REST API like Pokemon's, and a small Spotify made with Node JS, Mongo DB and Angular (which is still in development).

projects_list.name: Pokedex JS
projects_list.description: Exercise for consuming a REST API using promises with JavaScript.

projects_list.name: Erp - Tuc
projects_list.description: ERP system developed for the TUC Transport company, developed with Codeigniter and MySQL.

projects_list.name: Rock, Papers, or Scissors
projects_list.description: Exercise to simulate the game of Rock Paper or Scissors made with JavaScript.

projects_list.name: Samify
projects_list.description: Website inspired by Spotify, developed with Angular, Mongodb and Node JS (In development).

projects_list.name: Samflix
projects_list.description: Website inspired by Netflix, developed with React, Bootstrap, CSS and The Movie DB.

projects_list.name: Grupo Cognac
projects_list.description: Website Designed for the Cognac Musical Group

projects_list.name: POS System
projects_list.description: Point of Sale (POS) system that allows the management of sales, products, clients, modules, permissions, employees, and electronic invoicing, with real-time notifications and internal chat. Developed with Node.js, Angular, and MySQL. (Still in Development)
